title: how is this permaban worthy?
body:
also....for reference, the stfu was to feeding top laner who commanded me to go and take enemy blue buff while i had no vision or priority
Pre Game Lobby:
    ScornedJustice: hi ppl
    ScornedJustice: good evenin...lets get this !
    ScornedJustice: yea
    ScornedJustice: 1.5mil points on my other account
    ScornedJustice: ok
    ScornedJustice: but yes to ur question
    ScornedJustice: senna is mized dmg right
    ScornedJustice: k, takin more armor then


In Game:
    ScornedJustice: ward red and run plz
    ScornedJustice: stfu
    ScornedJustice: i am not trolling cuz i am not palying a cham pfor 1st rtime
    ScornedJustice: unlike our mid
    ScornedJustice: meanwhile mid
    ScornedJustice: farms
    ScornedJustice: so guess which lane wont get any ganks
    ScornedJustice: and will troll us all game
    ScornedJustice: DA
    ScornedJustice: when h eults u cant take him on
    ScornedJustice: imagine listening to pijngs
    [All]ScornedJustice: my bot lane way to cocky
    [All]ScornedJustice: they can report me and nothing was toxic
    ScornedJustice: i vorted yes
    ScornedJustice: dont fight him when he has ult up
    ScornedJustice: y dont u too learn the game and stop trolling u both 2 lvls behind
    ScornedJustice: and feeding
    ScornedJustice: and dont listen to pings
    ScornedJustice: i am gold1?
    ScornedJustice: u chose a champ u have no idea how to play
    ScornedJustice: but i am not behin in lvl unlike all of u?
    ScornedJustice: i voted yes already
    ScornedJustice: plz do
    ScornedJustice: idk which 1 of u said no...but u wont take credit forit
    [All]ScornedJustice: they r mad cuz they all fed
    [All]ScornedJustice: and i did not say a single toxic thing...plz feel fre to report...cuz nothing i said was toxic


Post Game Lobby:
    ScornedJustice: what doe sthat mean?
    ScornedJustice: nt?
    ScornedJustice: ah
    ScornedJustice: yea idk y he inted
    ScornedJustice: i told him dont fight when he has ult on u
    ScornedJustice: and nothing else
Game 3203848053:

Pre Game Lobby:
    ScornedJustice: any lane want me to camp it?
    ScornedJustice: i gank lanes with masteries only
    ScornedJustice: i dont regank lanes who farm when i gank them if they have enough health to get the kill
    ScornedJustice: champs r worth more gold...u can farm in peace after the kill
    ScornedJustice: if thats same yia s last game
    ScornedJustice: he builds pure crit
    ScornedJustice: skips summoner item


In Game:
    ScornedJustice: she confident
    ScornedJustice: ward lbue plz
    ScornedJustice: so u can 3v1 with mid when he invades back
    ScornedJustice: he cleared my top
    ScornedJustice: has buffs
    ScornedJustice: outplayeeeeed
    ScornedJustice: nice work
    ScornedJustice: wards?
    ScornedJustice: u guys wonder y they were guarding taht area?
    ScornedJustice: may b
    ScornedJustice: idk
    ScornedJustice: have map?
    ScornedJustice: y have an ul kaisa
    ScornedJustice: if u dont use it
    ScornedJustice: go farm ur lane kaisa
    ScornedJustice: u might catch up in lvl
    ScornedJustice: next game
    ScornedJustice: not!
    ScornedJustice: opgg said our bot lane was bad
    ScornedJustice: can we move on
    [All]ScornedJustice: lucky u can farm my top cuz top never wards
    [All]ScornedJustice: also my team wont ff so u might as well end plz
    [All]ScornedJustice: yea well bot lane was a troll from start
    [All]ScornedJustice: end plz
    [All]ScornedJustice: i am not stupid
    [All]ScornedJustice: i am tired and want to move on
    ScornedJustice: lucian on it
    [All]ScornedJustice: leav me alone and end
    ScornedJustice: they on baron
    ScornedJustice: yay its over
    ScornedJustice: bot can go troll somewhere else


Post Game Lobby:
    ScornedJustice: jk is on my bot lane troll players
    ScornedJustice: i couldnt lose lp
